Literature.Title: Biological Profiling of Coleoptericins and Coleoptericin-Like Antimicrobial Peptides from the Invasive Harlequin Ladybird Harmonia axyridis.
Literature.Author: Hirsch R, Wiesner J, Marker A, Bauer A, Hammann PE, Vilcinskas A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli RKI 131/08(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli RKI 6A-6(MIC=128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 30104(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae RKI 93/10(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae RKI 19/16(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa RKI 93/12(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii RKI 19/09(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>1024µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(no activity data)
